attributes.action: Stop the ECB banning cricket players from using Social Networking Sites like Twitter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ECB have banned players from using Twitter. Reading Twitter Updates from the players is not only highly entertaining it's a good use of modern technology.  The ECB should get with the times !

rejection.details: This is a matter for the ECB.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
